name: The Magic Candle: Volume 1
description:
The Magic Candle is best described as an Ultima clone. Its a top-down party-driven RPG.

The plot revolves around you (Lukas) and your party of intrepid adventurers, whose task it is to seal the demon Dreax within the Magic Candle (which is burning down, and when it does, he gets released).

The game has 3 difficulty levels (changing the number of 'days' you get to complete the game in.) A lot of travelling, dungeon-crawling, town-exploring, and especially, lots of conversing with NPCs.
alsoFor: Apple II, DOS, NES, PC-98 | Combined View

After you set up your character, you are summoned before the king.
This is the first screen of actual gameplay. You wander the castle, getting used to the controls and preparing for you mission.
You direct your actions toward things.  Here Lucas directed his conversation toward a guard.
The game varies the perspective which you the player are shown. At first you get a top down view. This screen room gives you a view from the side.
